name: Ofloxacin & Metronidazole Suspension
approved_name:
SUSPENSION PRESENTATION: 

Ofloxacin 50 mg
Metronidazole 120 mg
 



 
 
      
The composition of ofloxacin and metronidazole which works by preventing the repairing and division of the bacteria
Also, it kills the parasites and anaerobic bacteria that causes infections by affecting their DNA. 


  
 

Pneumonitis 
Urinary tract infections
Prostatitis 
It also treats diarrhoea 
Gonorrhoea
Useful in urethral infections 


  
 

Metronidazole undergoes reduction and this reduction usually occurs in bacteria and protozoans therefore they inhibit nucleic acid synthesis by causing disruption of DNA. 
Ofloxacin inhibits the enzyme topoisomerase 4 and DNA gyrase, DNA gyrase is required for the transcription, repair and replication of DNA. 
 





  
 

It is absorbed orally 
It is 20% bound to serum proteins 
It undergoes oxidation and glucuronidation 
It is excreted via urine 


  
 

Contraindicated in myasthenia gravis
